page.title: 12Recording Studio at Ladock 2
page.content:
Before Mr.Wood came to Trendeal he lived in{London}where he also ran a recording studio. He came to{Cornwall after his family moved down here and because he prefers the country life although he thinks the city is the best place to find work.
He{records music}mostly at his studio such as{pop, classical or small groups {of musicians from schools.}He enjoys pop music most of all; he used to play in a group when he was a teenager. He doesn't always record in the studio; he also goes out to record. One day next week he is going out to record a band of eighty musicians at St. Austell. {He does not work regular hours.}Often he works through the night. He works on his own because at the moment he doesn't earn enough to employ anyone.
